name: Cataract,MatureOrHypermature
title: Cataract, Mature or Hypermature
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of mature or hypermature cataract.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of mature or hypermature cataract, including senile or intumescent cataract.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to 'unspecified eye.')

concept.display: Hypermature senile cataract of right eye (disorder)

Hypermature senile cataract of bilateral eyes (disorder)
